🚨 INSANE DEAL ALERT: 2017 RAM 1500 Tradesman – JUST $10,495! 🚨

We’re not joking — if no one snags this truck soon, we might just buy it ourselves. It’s THAT good. This 2017 RAM 1500 Tradesman is clean, powerful, and priced at a steal for only $10,495 – that’s $2,395 BELOW CARFAX value!

🛻 Powerful 3.6L V6 – Built to haul, tow, and handle work or play
🧼 CLEAN Carfax – NO accidents reported
🛠️ Well-maintained with solid service history
🔁 Used for both personal and commercial purposes – rugged yet respected
📍 150,319 miles – and still ready for thousands more

💰 Priced like a beater… drives like a boss. This truck is perfect for your side hustle, job site, or just flexing on the daily commute.

💥 Includes our 90-day warranty, with extended coverage and GAP insurance options available
🧰 Fully inspected with our 144-point service and safety check – peace of mind included

📍 AutoMax of Las Vegas | 3141 Fremont St

🌐 AutoMaxLV.com
